# Create a team
In this section you create a team ("my team") in Tercen.

* On the home page (once logged in) you notice there are two teams pre-installed
    + site-library
    + test-team


![](images/home_team.png)

* On the home page (once logged in) click on the `Create a team`

* Enter "my team" in the `Name` and click `OK`
![](images/create_team.png)


* You see an entry `my team` on the Tercen home page.

![](images/home_with_my_team.png)

You have created a team in Tercen. The next section will install useful operators for this team.
